FuncDef:
The ipv4 vpn command creates and displays the BMP session IPv4 VPN view.
The undo ipv4 vpn command deletes the BMP session IPv4 VPN view.
By default, the BMP session IPv4 VPN view does not exist.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To create and enter the BMP session IPv4 VPN view, run the ipv4 vpn command in the BMP session view.
Follow-up Procedure
After this configuration is performed, you can run either of the following commands as needed:
trace-prefix route-distinguisher vrfRD ipv4-address mask-length: configures BMP to report the trace data of a specified VPNv4 route and the IPv4 VPN unicast route (transformed from the VPNv4 route) to the BMP server.trace-prefix route-distinguisher vrfRD all: configures BMP to report the trace data of all VPNv4 routes and IPv4 VPN unicast routes (transformed from the VPNv4 routes) to the BMP server.
